title: Patch Notes
content: value. Fixed Ability Point bonuses not influencing the number of prepared spells in Character Creation. Updated the Movement Speed tooltip to show remaining movement more precisely. The Spellbook will now correctly display the spells you've unlocked through feats when playing on keyboard and mouse. Items and characters in your inventory that you can't throw will now show up in the Throw menu but will appear disabled. Fixed the in-dialogue UI buttons overlapping the text on some screen ratios.
